name: GreenHunt
description:
"The Earth is what we have all in common"

Green Hunt is a serious game whose aim is to raise awareness of people on the environment and how to protect it.

Let's save the nature!

Find all the 10 objects around the ground before is too late!

Pick them up and answer the ecological questions to gain more time and to save the forest from pollution!

Three Levels

Too easy for you to complete the first step? 

Don't worry, you can play it on bigger maps and with more difficult questions!

Will you be a real Greta by completing all the levels?

Level One MapLevel Two MapLevel Three Map Hurry Up!

Time goes on and on... and on!

Don't get yourself overwhelmed by the clock and save the environment before the time's up!

Eyes on Trivia!

Answer the quiz correctly is the key of success!

You will have more time for your Green Treasure Hunt and you will acknowledge important information about our environment
